Body:
global uid
res = client.patch('/users/' + uid, data=json.dumps({'phone_number':
    '654321'}), headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 200
assert res.json == {'result': 'OK'}
res = client.patch('/users/' + uid, data=json.dumps({'first_name': 123}),
    headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 422
assert 'errors' in res.json
